I - GHOST Library

1. Core Classes

gstNodeBase class for scene graph nodes.
gstNodeNameHandles character string for node names.
gstPHANToMPHANToM haptic interface class.
gstPHANToM_SCPRepresents the PHANToM's SCP in the scene graph, usually not needed.
gstSceneHolds haptic scene and mediates interaction with the PHANToM and servo loop.
gstSeparatorNode class that allows grouping of nodes under it into a sub-tree.
gstTransformNode class that adds 3D transformations and callbacks to nodes.
gstTransformMatrixHomogeneous 3d tranformation matrix class.
gstTransformMatrix::Proxy
gstTransformMatrix::Proxy1D

operator*

operator*
operator<<
